about_the_game:
Vatii is a dangerous mage, and you need to defeat him.

Navigate a massive world that reacts to your paint.

The world is dangerous and decaying, so you'll need to be careful when discovering new areas. Be on the look out for anything that you can paint to fill in the world, change the state of puzzles, and repair things that have been broken.

Find unique abilities and use crystals to upgrade your abilities.

As you explore you will discover powerful relics that give you new abilities and colors. Crystals you find can be channeled to unlock these abilities and upgrade them further so that you can survive and affect the dangerous landscape.

Get help from this world's denizens.

Help various characters with quests, trade with them, and get to know them to unlock important information and powerful upgrades.

Find and defeat the Mad Mage, Vatii.

Complete each of the 3 areas to unlock the hidden realm of the Mad Mage. If you've gained enough resources, relics, and knowledge of the game world you can defeat him and finally escape this crystalline prison.
